page.title: 01Farming
page.content: We interviewed {Mr.R.Holmes}at{ {Cloudlands Farm,Allington.} His farm is 80 acres .On the farm he has got chickens,a few beef cattle and some calves.In the winter the cattle sleep indoors.They have got barley,potatoes and peas and they have got one tractor,a combine harvester,a plough and a drill.Each day they start work at 9.a.m. {Mr.Maffeys}farm in{Newton Toney}is 310 acres.He has got barley,oats and wheat.He has got a seed drill,two tractors a plough and a combine harvester.He finishes work about 4.30 p.m at the earliest.And he starts work about 6.30.a.m.He trained on the farm and he learnt to drive the tractor.In his spare time he does gardening and shooting.
